text: aur jab un (kuphfaar) se kaha jaata hai ki (maale duniya se) jo khuda ne tumhen diya hai usamen se kuchh (khuda kee raah mein bhee) kharch karo to (ye) kuphfaar eemaanavaalon se kahate hain ki bhala ham us shakhs ko khilaen jise (tumhaare khyaal ke muvaafiq) khuda chaahata to usako khud khilaata ki tum log bas sareehee gumaraahee mein (pade hue) ho
